naslov: Zemljište s projektom luksuzne vile – Brela, panoramski pogled more (prodaja)
opis: Građevinsko zemljište s idejnim projektom luksuzne vile – Brela, panoramski pogled na more U ponudi je atraktivno građevinsko zemljište smješteno na uzvisini iznad Brela, jedne od najpoželjnijih lokacija na Makarskoj rivijeri. S parcele se pruža zadivljujući panoramski pogled na more, otoke i zalaske sunca. Udaljenost do mora i predivnih plaža iznosi svega 400 metara zračne linije. Zemljište ima površinu od 736 m², a idejni projekt predviđa izgradnju luksuzne troetažne vile bruto površine 380 m² (330 m² neto stambene površine, plus prostrane terase i bazen). Vila je dizajnirana kao moderna rezidencija s dvije odvojene stambene jedinice – idealno za veću obitelj, goste ili kao turističku investiciju. Glavne značajke projekta: • Tri etaže: suteren, prizemlje i kat • bazen, sunčalište, prostori za opuštanje i vrt • Prva stambena jedinica (dvojetažna): o Prostrani dnevni boravak, kuhinja i blagovaonica s izlazom na dvorište o Tri spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom i terasom o Prostor za fitness i spa zonu • Druga stambena jedinica (na vrhu vile): o Hodnik, kuhinja, blagovaonica i kupaonica o Dvije spavaće sobe o Velika polunatkrivena terasa s pogledom na more Svaka soba u vili orijentirana je prema moru, pružajući neprekidan pogled i maksimalnu privatnost. Dodatne informacije: • U cijenu je uključen idejni projekt i zemljište • Komunalni doprinosi u cijeni • Građevinska dozvola je predana, a očekivani datum izdavanja je listopad 2025. Ova nekretnina predstavlja izvrsnu priliku za izgradnju luksuzne vile na jednoj od najtraženijih lokacija Jadrana – bilo kao obiteljska oaza ili investicija za turističko iznajmljivanje - prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% + pdv od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. - NAPOMENA: detaljne slike, video, te lokaciju, šaljemo isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor eng ------------------------------- Building plot with a preliminary design for a luxury villa – Brela, panoramic sea view We offer an attractive building plot located on a hill above Brela, one of the most desirable locations on the Makarska Riviera. The plot offers a stunning panoramic view of the sea, islands and sunsets. The distance to the sea and beautiful beaches is only 400 meters as the crow flies. The plot has an area of 736 m², and the preliminary design envisages the construction of a luxury three-storey villa with a gross area of 380 m² (330 m² net living area, plus spacious terraces and a swimming pool). The villa is designed as a modern residence with two separate residential units – ideal for a larger family, guests or as a tourist investment. Main features of the project: • Three floors: basement, ground floor and first floor • swimming pool, sun deck, relaxation areas and garden • First residential unit (two-story): o Spacious living room, kitchen and dining room with access to the yard o Three bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and terrace o Fitness and spa area • Second residential unit (on the top of the villa): o Hallway, kitchen, dining room and bathroom o Two bedrooms o Large semi-covered terrace with sea view Every room in the villa is oriented towards the sea, providing uninterrupted views and maximum privacy. Additional information: • The price includes a preliminary design and land • Utilities included in the price • The building permit has been submitted, and the expected date of issue is October 2025. This property represents an excellent opportunity to build a luxury villa in one of the most sought-after locations on the Adriatic - either as a family oasis or an investment for tourist rentals - sold by the #adriaINgroup agency - the buyer pays an agency fee of 3% + VAT of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is possible only with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the purchase and sale, all in accordance with the Real Estate Brokerage Act. - NOTE: detailed pictures, video, and location are sent only with a signed brokerage contract #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
